refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the Modelica directory path needed by Xcos diagram containing Modelica blocks

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is used to know where are the Modelica files used to define Xcos Modelica blocks.
If the user wants to define his own Modelica blocks, Modelica files describing the blocks must be indicated. The variable %MODELICA_USER_LIBS has to be declared before launching xcos.

listitem.para: modelica_path: a string given the absolute path of the Modelica directory containing the defining blocks Modelica files.
modelica_directory: a string given the name of the Modelica directory where are created the files needed for the simulation.
